HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Doprava zdarma u objednávek nad 700 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.free_delivery_limit: Doprava zdarma u objednávek nad 700 Kč

PARCEL_LOCKERS.free_delivery_limit: Doprava zdarma u objednávek nad 700 Kč

SUMMARY:
SHIPPING OPTIONS: SHEIN provides three delivery methods for Czechia: Standard Home Delivery (PPL), Express Home Delivery, and Pickup Point delivery (Zásilkovna), which includes both parcel shops and Z-BOX parcel lockers. PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 129 Kč, while pickup point delivery is 99 Kč. Express delivery is priced at 690 Kč. Free standard shipping is offered on orders over 700 Kč. DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery takes approximately 7-10 business days. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The main delivery options are provided by established local carriers PPL and Zásilkovna. The free shipping threshold is relatively low. There are no options for bulky item delivery, in-store pickup, or Cash on Delivery (COD). 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located in the website's footer under 'Doprava'. The details are presented clearly, outlining the costs, carriers, and conditions for free shipping for each available method.
